column5: The M.Sc is designed for Addiction Recovery Practitioners working across the Addiction and support services.  The course is offered by the Department of Public Health and Primary Care at the School of Medicine, Trinity College Dublin with a range of teaching from leading experts from across Trinity College as well as leading clinicians the Health Service Executive.
